About this site

# load dataset


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data <- read.csv("Parkinsons-Telemonitoring-ucirvine.csv")
```
:::



# 1. Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)

## Summary statistics

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(data)
```

## Visualize distributions of total UPDRS


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data, aes(x=total_updrs)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth=1, fill='skyblue', color='black') +
  labs(title='Distribution of Total UPDRS', x='Total UPDRS', y='Frequency')
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](project_title_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## Boxplot for age vs. total UPDRS


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data, aes(x=factor(age), y=total_updrs)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill='lightgreen') +
  labs(title='Age vs. Total UPDRS', x='Age', y='Total UPDRS') +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=90))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](project_title_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



# 2. Correlation and Regression Analysis


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Correlation matrix
cor_matrix <- cor(data[, c("age", "motor_updrs", "total_updrs", "jitter", "shimmer", "nhr", "hnr")])
print(cor_matrix)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
                     age motor_updrs total_updrs      jitter     shimmer
age          1.000000000  0.27366476  0.31028993  0.02307118  0.10155386
motor_updrs  0.273664760  1.00000000  0.94723131  0.08481576  0.10234870
total_updrs  0.310289929  0.94723131  1.00000000  0.07424667  0.09214091
jitter       0.023071181  0.08481576  0.07424667  1.00000000  0.70979112
shimmer      0.101553856  0.10234870  0.09214091  0.70979112  1.00000000
nhr          0.007092699  0.07496727  0.06095164  0.82529366  0.79515848
hnr         -0.104842069 -0.15702858 -0.16211683 -0.67518824 -0.80141600
                     nhr        hnr
age          0.007092699 -0.1048421
motor_updrs  0.074967270 -0.1570286
total_updrs  0.060951644 -0.1621168
jitter       0.825293655 -0.6751882
shimmer      0.795158485 -0.8014160
nhr          1.000000000 -0.6844119
hnr         -0.684411857  1.0000000
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Visualize correlation matrix
library(corrplot)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: package 'corrplot' was built under R version 4.5.1
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
corrplot 0.95 loaded
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
corrplot(cor_matrix, method="color", type="upper", tl.cex=0.8)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](project_title_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Linear Regression model: Predicting Total UPDRS using jitter and shimmer
lm_model <- lm(total_updrs ~ jitter + shimmer, data=data)
summary(lm_model)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

Call:
lm(formula = total_updrs ~ jitter + shimmer, data = data)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-26.365  -7.332  -1.519   7.553  26.337 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  27.6897     0.2321 119.312  < 2e-16 ***
jitter       33.9171    35.0935   0.966    0.334    
shimmer      32.9216     7.6397   4.309 1.66e-05 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 10.66 on 5872 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.008648,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.00831 
F-statistic: 25.61 on 2 and 5872 DF,  p-value: 8.424e-12
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Multiple Linear Regression including age and sex
multi_lm <- lm(total_updrs ~ jitter + shimmer + age + sex, data=data)
summary(multi_lm)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

Call:
lm(formula = total_updrs ~ jitter + shimmer + age + sex, data = data)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-24.449  -7.660  -1.337   7.464  24.782 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  4.88057    0.99302   4.915 9.12e-07 ***
jitter      94.01670   33.36093   2.818  0.00485 ** 
shimmer     13.07136    7.30299   1.790  0.07353 .  
age          0.36664    0.01508  24.319  < 2e-16 ***
sextrue     -2.03085    0.28395  -7.152 9.59e-13 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 10.1 on 5870 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.1089,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.1083 
F-statistic: 179.3 on 4 and 5870 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```


:::
:::




# 3. Logistic Regression (Categorize UPDRS severity first)


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Categorize UPDRS severity (example: mild < 20, moderate = 20-30, severe > 30)
data$severity <- cut(data$total_updrs, breaks=c(-Inf, 20, 30, Inf), labels=c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"))

# Logistic regression predicting severe vs non-severe
data$severe_binary <- ifelse(data$severity=="Severe", 1, 0)

# Fit logistic regression
logit_model <- glm(severe_binary ~ jitter + shimmer + age + sex, data=data, family=binomial())
summary(logit_model)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

Call:
glm(formula = severe_binary ~ jitter + shimmer + age + sex, family = binomial(), 
    data = data)

Coefficients:
             Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|)    
(Intercept) -2.324343   0.209643 -11.087  < 2e-16 ***
jitter      -0.772055   6.723934  -0.115    0.909    
shimmer      6.773637   1.481060   4.574 4.80e-06 ***
age          0.029939   0.003166   9.456  < 2e-16 ***
sextrue     -0.407588   0.058676  -6.946 3.75e-12 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

(Dispersion parameter for binomial family taken to be 1)

    Null deviance: 8033.3  on 5874  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 7839.7  on 5870  degrees of freedom
AIC: 7849.7

Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 4
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ROC Curve analysis
library(pROC)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: package 'pROC' was built under R version 4.5.1
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Type 'citation("pROC")' for a citation.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```

Attaching package: 'pROC'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    cov, smooth, var
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
roc_obj <- roc(data$severe_binary, fitted(logit_model))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Setting levels: control = 0, case = 1
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Setting direction: controls < cases
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(roc_obj, col="blue", main="ROC Curve for Severe UPDRS Classification")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](project_title_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
auc(roc_obj) # Area Under the Curve
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Area under the curve: 0.5892
```


:::
:::
